docs.snippet: Bill Miller, an influential political consultant, led an effort to create an educational video and to make viewing it mandatory for student-athletes....
docs.lead_paragraph: Bill Miller, an influential political consultant, led an effort to create an educational video and to make viewing it mandatory for student-athletes.
docs.abstract: Juliet Macur Sports of The Times column lauds efforts by Bill Miller, father who leads initiative to educate Texas students and student-athletes on violence against women through video presentation.

headline.main: A Father in Texas Takes On Sexual Assault in Sports
headline.print_headline: A Father Confronts Violence Against Women

docs.snippet: Mayweather Jr., who on Saturday will meet Manny Pacquiao in a money swamp of a championship welterweight bout, has a long and documented history of employing brutality beyond the boxing ring....
docs.lead_paragraph: Mayweather Jr., who on Saturday will meet Manny Pacquiao in a money swamp of a championship welterweight bout, has a long and documented history of employing brutality beyond the boxing ring.
docs.abstract: Michael Powell Sports of The Times column notes that boxer Floyd Mayweather Jr's abusive behavior outside ring does not seem to have dissuaded his fans and that boxing itself should be seen in negative light based on his crimes.

headline.main: Floyd Mayweather Jr., a Champion in the Ring, Is Something Very Different Out of It
headline.print_headline: Champion in Ring Is Something Very Different Out of It

docs.snippet: Millions of Filipinos pack public gymnasiums, movie houses, restaurants and homes of relatives and friends with pay-per-view to cheer on their boxing hero Manny Pacquiao from halfway across the world in his fight against American Floyd Mayweather....

docs.snippet: Washington’s hard-hitting style, which carried over from its first-round series against the Islanders, left the Rangers looking to regroup from a Game 1 loss....
docs.lead_paragraph: Washington’s hard-hitting style, which carried over from its first-round series against the Islanders, left the Rangers looking to regroup from a Game 1 loss.
docs.abstract: New York Rangers know they must get tough to match aggressive style of Washington Capitals in order to win second-round playoff series.

headline.main: Rangers Try to Match Toughness of Capitals
headline.print_headline: Rangers Try to Match Toughness of Capitals

docs.snippet: Celebrities are taking sides in the Floyd Mayweather-Manny Pacquiao matchup just like everyone else. Unlike most of us, some of the stars are close friends of the fighters, can scoff at a $100,000 wager or a $10,000 ticket and will get to be cente...
docs.lead_paragraph: Celebrities are taking sides in the Floyd Mayweather-Manny Pacquiao matchup just like everyone else. Unlike most of us, some of the stars are close friends of the fighters, can scoff at a $100,000 wager or a $10,000 ticket and will get to be center stage on the Las Vegas club scene during a weekend where watchers are willing to pony up $50,000 for a table.

headline.main: Celebrities: Fight-Watching, Betting and Making Vegas Money
headline.print_headline: Celebrities: Fight-Watching, Betting and Making Vegas Money
